Name: michigander
Description: Gain 2 points for all trees found in Michigan.

Name: tree climber
Description: Gain 10 bonus points for having the tallest combined height of trees.

Name: utility forester
Description: Gain 2 points for all trees that are commonly found under power lines.

Name: tree trimmer
Description: Gain 10 bonus points for having the most trees that are a fire hazard.
